page.title: 15Games children play;Tremorfa
page.content: 1.Elastic:In Elastic you haveto get a long length of elastic.Two people have to stand inside and stretch the elastic around their ankles as they face each other.A third person puts one leg inside and one leg outside and jumps in and out and side to side saying;England,Ireland,Scotland and Wales.Then the person jumps inside,then keeps jumping in and out while while the elastic is raised higher towards their knees. 2.Mob:About 5 people play and one counts to 50 while everybody hides.The person who is counting tries to find one of the pupils and before the person hiding gets to the place where the person was counting,they have to say;"Mob,Mob",followed by a name;"1,2,3,all out" .The first one mobbed is on it.
